properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for encrypting JSON Web Tokens.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Expiration for JWT cookies (in seconds) - used with Remember Me functionality.

properties.name: client.base.url
properties.description: Base URL of client making requests to API (for CORS settings).

properties.name: server.base.url
properties.description: Base URL of server making requests to API (for CORS settings).

properties.name: app.user.content.storage
properties.description: Where should the user uploaded content be stored.

properties.name: app.user.root.enabled
properties.description: Whether the root user should be created when there are no users in database.

properties.name: app.aws.s3.region
properties.description: Region of Amazon S3 bucket for storing user content.

properties.name: app.aws.s3.bucket
properties.description: Name of Amazon S3 bucket for storing user content.

properties.name: app.aws.accesskey
properties.description: Access key for Amazon Web Services.

properties.name: app.aws.secretkey
properties.description: Secret key for Amazon Web Services.

properties.name: app.sba.secret
properties.description: Secret key for registering app in Spring Boot Admin.

properties.name: app.mail.sender
properties.description: Sender e-mail address for system mails (if SMTP server is configured).
